ai-tika-vin02t34:1_1: But how the starting point is said: “It has been performed, thirty-two parts of the moon.” It is said, “what has been made by the stage of compassion, thus it is the “wakened” .
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_2: Sisters of the three Piṭakas which were preached by the Dhamma, therefore (and saying): “The three sections of the Aṅgakas, opposites, and three (permissions of) the Faiths of Pāṭakas).”
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_4: they very learned, great I say:
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_5: In this way the Vinaya, (made) stands in accordance with the Teaching, or if it is prescribed, it is prescribed, experts on the Monastic Law, and on the acts of mindfulness.
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_6: But what of the Monastic Law says to one who is learned?”
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_7: (but) if he stands by heart, he should enquire to each other.
ai-tika-vin02t34:1_8: his retinue is surrounded by that retinue.
ai-tika-vin02t34:2_2: Lack of mangoes, trembling, and thoughts are produced,
ai-tika-vin02t34:3_0: So if he trains in the training, in the Vinaya, which is percipient with the Texts on monastic training, he can train in the Vinaya and requested by making the training. Since it is said: “One who is mindful, including the training, the community” .
ai-tika-vin02t34:4_0: Firstly, the first is announced by the first stage in the first phrases, “Where do they all go about?” And the start with one part of the body and mind is keeping to the mind on their way, their origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
ai-tika-vin02t34:5_0: Since a nun who follows rolling the legs for two years, thinking, “How can a nun who has trained for two years?” But she does not follow her for two years.
ai-tika-vin02t34:6_0: Sittles down too much by others, some of the lions haven’t been stored out or eighteen.
